Answers.MP Summary: create a new user or update default new user information

Explanations about Options.-d:
The new user will be created using HOME_DIR as the value for the user's login
 directory. The default is to append the LOGIN name to BASE_DIR and use that as the
 login directory name. The directory HOME_DIR does not have to exist but will not be
 created if it is missing.
Explanations about Options.-m:
Create the user's home directory if it does not exist. The files and directories
 contained in the skeleton directory (which can be defined with the -k option) will be
 copied to the home directory.
Explanations about Options.-s: The name of a new user's login shell.

Answers.MP Summary: Wi-Fi Protected Access client and IEEE 802.1X supplicant
Top-3 Similar Questions: ul_226322: Creating a Wireless Network Management GUI workaround
Top-3 Scripts:
ul_226322: rc-update add wpa_supplicant boot

echo > /etc/wpa_supplicant/wpa_supplicant.conf
chmod +777 /etc/wpa_supplicant/wpa_supplicant.conf
chmod -r /etc/wpa_supplicant/wpa_supplicant.conf
echo > /usr/sbin/wireless_gui
chmod +x /usr/sbin/wireless_gui
echo > /usr/sbin/wireless_check
chmod +x /usr/sbin/wireless_check
echo > /sbin/wpa_restart
chmod +x /sbin/wpa_restart

#!/bin/ash
rc-service wpa_supplicant restart
